勾三搭四.definition: to make hanky-panky; to seduce women

勾兌.definition: to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)

勾出.definition: to delineate; to articulate; to evoke; to draw out; to tick off

勾勒.definition: to draw the outline of; to outline; to sketch; to delineate contours of; to give a brief account of

勾心鬥角.definition: to fight and scheme against each other (idiom); (in palace construction) elaborate and refined

勾手.definition: to collude with; to collaborate; (basketball) hook shot

勾搭.definition: to gang up; to fool around with; to make up to

勾留.definition: to stay; to stop over; to break one's journey

勾破.definition: (of sth sharp) to snag (one's stockings etc)

勾結.definition: to collude with; to collaborate with; to gang up with

勾縫.definition: to point a brick wall; to grout a tiled surface

勾聯.definition: variant of 勾連|勾连[gou1 lian2]

勾起.definition: to evoke; to induce; to call to mind; to pick up with a hook

勾踐.definition: King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸

勾連.definition: to be linked together; to be involved with; to collude; interconnection; involvement; collusion

勾選.definition: to select (one or more options from a list); to check (a box)

勾闌.definition: variant of 勾欄|勾栏[gou1 lan2]

勾魂.definition: to take away sb's soul; (fig.) to captivate; to enchant
